description:
T373 - Lime - Front Garden - crown reduce to previous or suitable points removing up to 2m 
T374 - Holly - Front garden - Hedge cut skirt to 2.5m
T405 - Willow - Car park -  Re-Pollard to previous or suitable points removing up to 2m 
G375-384 - Mixed x 10 - Entrance Road -  Crown lift overhang to approx 5m to provide clearance to high sided vehicles. 
T407 - Birch - Car Park -  crown lift to approx 2.5m
T409 - Cherry - Car Park -  crown lift to approx 2.5m
T408 - Ash - Car Park -  Crown reduce removing up to 1.5m
T402 - Prunus - Car Park - Crown reduce removing up to 1m to ease weight.
T392 - Prunus - Car Park - crown lift to approx 2.5m
T391 - Prunus - Car Park -  remove Deadwood
T390 - Beech - Car Park -  remove Deadwood
T401 - Cypress - Garden -  Crown reduce removing up to 2m reducing lateral branches back from property and Crown lifting over drying area to approx 3m to provide clearance.
T370 - Prunus - Front Garden - crown reduce removing up to 1m
T385 - Poplar - Entrance Road -  crown reduce to previous or suitable points removing up to 3m 
T2613 - Cherry - Car Park -crown lift to approx 5m
T399 - Cypress - Garden. - crown reduce removing up to 2m reducing to previous height.
T400 - Cypress - Garden. - crown reduce removing up to 2m reducing to previous height.
Reason - Works are all for general maintenance purposes.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
